text_block_list.text: Hishi Amazon and I go out for lunch<n>at a buffet.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you've got a pretty good spread<n>there! Which sides did
you end up<n>grabbing?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wait, those plate colors look familiar...<n>Is it just me, or do
you get the exact<n>same thing every time we come<n>here?

I explain to her that I always seem to<n>inadvertently pick out
the grilled<n>dishes.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Geez, I expected better from you,<n>Teach! You can't let
yourself fall into a<n>routine like that!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's not how you stay healthy. You<n>gotta quit eating the
same ol' things<n>and broaden those nutritional<n>horizons!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And working out is just as important.<n>Speaking of, I've
actually been<n>wondering...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You are exercising, right, Teach?You're not making us bust our buttswhile you sit back and take it easy,are ya?
choice_data_list: I work out a decent amount...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: "Decent"? If you think that'senough for a trainer to stay in shape,you're way off base!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I can't just let this one slide. All right,<n>leave it to ol'
Hishiama! I'll get that<n>bod of yours nice and toned up, or I<n>
ain't the leader of the Miho Dorm!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Now, c'monâ€”follow me!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We'll start off with some light<n>jogging! But the lesson
won't be over<n>'til you manage to pass me! Ready,<n>set,
hyaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What're you walking for? ...Wait, you<n>call that running?
You're never gonna<n>slim down creepin' along at a snail's<n>
pace like that.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Next up is strength training. And I<n>don't mean some
half-assed regimen<n>where you do one set and call it a<n>
day. We're talkin' circuit training!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Arms, legs, abs! Arms, legs, abs! Just<n>when you think it's
time for a break,<n>we work that back! Show me a bow<n>
pose!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What's with that lousy form? C'mon,<n>you gotta bend more!
Can't be a bow<n>without loops!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what're you slacking off for?<n>This is a one-on-one, not
a lie-on-floor!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wait, Teach?! Oh, for cryin' out loud.<n>What gives? I've
never seen such a<n>sorry sight.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha. Okay, maaaybe I got a little<n>too fired up. Sorry 'bout
that, I'm just<n>wired that way.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
When I help somebody out, I've got<n>to see it through to the
very end.<n>Otherwise it just doesn't sit right with<n>me,
y'know?
choice_data_list: You sound like a doting wife.
You sound like a doting wife.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: A-a wife?! Enough with themushy stuff! It's not like I'm doing itout of the goodness of my heart.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I just always wanna take the lead. So<n>I've got no clue what
it's like to run a<n>three-legged race with somebody.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Even when it comes to you, I still<n>don't really know the right
way to act<n>together and build a friendship.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I may be a pro at one-on-ones, but<n>this whole hand-in-hand
thing is<n>another story.
choice_data_list: You'll get used to it little by little.
You'll get used to it little by little.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Little by little, huh? Yeah... Not sure if I<n>can pull it off, but I'll
have to give it a<n>try!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: After all, the two of us are just<n>getting started!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Right on! Hahaha, looks like you've<n>bounced back a bit.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And that means... break time is over!<n>Let's get back to the
workout.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what's with the look of horror?<n>Like I said, once I've
decided to help<n>somebody, I never give up on 'em.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So lemme see those legs moving!<n>Hahaha, it's hard to tell
which one of<n>us is the trainer at this point. Can't<n>say I
mind it though!

Despite being unsure how to match<n>another person's stride
and pace,<n>Amazon nevertheless sets out to run<n>her first
proverbial three-legged race.
